message: http://www.fims.uwo.ca/newmedia/newmedia2004/energy/energy_unrau_wolf_d2_p.htm Site talks about how a person building an ES got volenteers to help.  Seems practical.  Could see if any University wanted to talk about 0 impact living, or had ideas for us.  People to help in any way.
I threw in links to the Rocket stove, solar water heater and cooler (very weird).  Underfloor heating seems interesting.  Need to look into composting toilets.

Freecycling may come in handy.  There was a Discovery Channel show that had a group renovate and decorate a luxury apartment mostly with freecycling.  Could be a useful/entertaining watch.  
http://www.freecycle.org/
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Junk_Raiders
